column1: Are landings located on appropriate ground?
Did operations in wetlands avoid altering hydrology of the site to
such a degree as to convert a wetland to a non wetland?
Did the operation avoid activities during particularly wet weather?
Is water movement maintained on the site?
Was low ground pressure equipment (LGP) utilized where needed?
Was the harvesting system appropriate for the site conditions?
Were the 15 mandatory road BMPs followed for wetland roads?
Were the six mandatory site-prep BMPs followed as needed?
William Lakel, Ph.D, Water Quality Program Supervisor
Matt Poirot, Assistant Director of Forest Management for
Design by Janet Muncy, Public Information Specialist
